mapper.insert: insert into tbl_donation(id, goal_point, donation_s_date, donation_e_date) values (#{id}, #{goalPoint}, #{donationSDate}, #{donationEDate})
mapper.select:
select d.id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.member_id, p.created_date, d.goal_point, d.donation_s_date, d.donation_e_date
from tbl_donation d join tbl_post p on d.id = p.id where d.id = #{id}

SELECT d.id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.member_id, p.created_date, d.goal_point, d.donation_s_date, d.donation_e_date FROM tbl_donation d JOIN tbl_post p ON d.id = p.id WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT d.id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.member_id, p.created_date, d.goal_point, d.donation_s_date, d.donation_e_date FROM tbl_donation d JOIN tbl_post p ON d.id = p.id WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId} and p.created_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} + interval '1' day order by p.created_date desc
